content: cheeky heart the pattern is written in english us difficulty level - beginner cheeky heart is a downloadable crochet amigurumi pattern you can download after payment this pattern is an orginal design by josephine laurin pinktomatocrochet and is for personal use only do not redistribute sell or edit this pattern you may sell items made from this pattern but please credit josephine laurin @pinktomatocrochet as the original designer please do not copy or use my photos without my consent this pattern has been tested by an experienced tester group if you have any questions contact me
